main.description: Resolve a named dataset label to its underlying dataset entry. When version is omitted, resolves to the most recently created label with the given name.

handle.description: DID or handle of the dataset owner

version.description: Specific version to resolve. If omitted, resolves to latest.

uri.description: AT-URI of the resolved dataset entry

cid.description: CID of the resolved dataset entry

label.description: The label record that was resolved

errors.name: LabelNotFound
errors.description: No label found with the given name
